description:
Sixt is an international provider of mobility services. The "Spirit of mobility" – Sixt's motto – has already spread to 100 countries worldwide. Customers can access over 175,000 vehicles at about 4,000 service points around the world under the Sixt brand. 

Get an overview of the most important features of the new Sixt webOS application: 

• Select your hire car out of all vehicle categories, vans or trucks 
• Book Sixt Express rates 
• Our station finder will show you the nearest Sixt location via GPS or have a look for a specific location by manual serach 
• Keep track of your reservations mobilely: have a look at your reservation history 
• Cancel your reservation on the go if your plans have changed
